items.title: You Have 17 Days To Comply — New Rules Impact 500 Million Outlook Users
items.description: Microsoft to enforce strict email authentication rules for Outlook.com users on May 5 — what you need to know.

items.title: Freely Streaming Service To Add 16 New Live Channels
items.description: Plus nearly 100 more if your Freely-capable TV happens to be a Hisense or Toshiba.

items.title: ‘Black Mirror’ Dethroned In Netflix’s Top 10 List By A New Show
items.description: Here's what new show has knocked Black Mirror off the #1 spot in Netflix's top 10 list.

items.title: Nintendo Announces Switch 2 U.S. Pre-Order Date, ‘Maintains’ High Prices
items.description: Nintendo has now finally given a day for U.S. pre-orders for the Switch 2, but it says it's not changing any of its prices despite fan pushback.

items.title: Concept Home Saves Cash, Energy, And Can Scale
items.description: The VISION House is a discovery in attainable and sustainable housing, delivered with thoughtful consideration from a builder and its suppliers.
